prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Piano, Drums, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, but not the Bass.

Style 2:
The Pipe, Piano, Drums, and Guitar are all present in this song, but the Bass is absent.

Style 3:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Piano, Drums, and Guitar, omitting the Bass.
